name: GHSnooze
description: An easier way to deal with github notifications

scripts.postinstall: if [ ! -f src/config.json ]; then cp config.json.example src/config.json; fi; if [ ! -f .env ]; then touch .env; fi
scripts.test: npm run-script style && npm run-script unit-tests
scripts.build-osx: if [ -d dist/GHSnooze-darwin-x64 ]; then rm -r dist/GHSnooze-darwin-x64; fi && electron-packager src --out=dist --app-version=$npm_package_version --prune --asar --overwrite --appname=GHSnooze --platform=darwin --arch=all --ignore=test
scripts.build-linux: if [ -d dist/GHSnooze-linux-ia32 ]; then rm -r dist/GHSnooze-linux-ia32; fi && if [ -d dist/GHSnooze-linux-x64 ]; then rm -r dist/GHSnooze-linux-x64; fi && electron-packager src --out=dist --app-version=$npm_package_version --prune --asar --overwrite --appname=GHSnooze --platform=linux --arch=all --ignore=test
scripts.build-windows-wine: if [ -d dist/GHSnooze-win32-ia32 ]; then rm -r dist/GHSnooze-win32-ia32; fi && if [ -d dist/GHSnooze-win32-x64 ]; then rm -r dist/GHSnooze-win32-x64; fi && electron-packager src --out=dist --app-version=$npm_package_version --prune --asar --overwrite --appname=GHSnooze --platform=win32 --arch=all --ignore=test

author: probablycorey and cheshire137
